description: Construction of two-storey building comprising of two self-contained units with associated refuse, recycling and cycle parking facilities (following demolition of existing garages)
decision_conditions: The proposed development, which directly faces onto the pavement on Chaucer Road, by reason of its design and siting result in an overbearing impact, increased feeling of enclosure and constitutes a dominant, obtrusive and incongruous form of development which would detract from the appearance of the wider area and would be detrimental to the visual qualities of the street scene. As such the proposed development would be contrary to Policy D2 of the Draft New London Plan 2018, Policy 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), Policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.

| The proposal due to its siting, scale and design and lack of provision of defensible space to Chaucer Road would provide a poor quality of accommodation for future residents of proposed flat 1 through loss of privacy. As such, the proposal is contrary to policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies D1 and D2 of the Draft London Plan 2018 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 Achieving well-designed places.

| The proposal due to its siting and scale would result in harmful impacts on residential amenity in relation to the occupants of the existing flatted property at no.11a Newburgh Road and 70 Chaucer Road through an increased sense of enclosure, overbearing and overshadowing impact; and on the amenities of no.70 Chaucer Road in terms of overshadowing. As such, the proposal is contrary to policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies D1 and D2 of the Draft London Plan 2018 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 Achieving well-designed places.
